description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6a0nt","text":"This protocol details the procedure of purification of immune cells from the mouse small intestine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"2a7uf","text":"Ivanov, II, McKenzie, B.S., Zhou, L., Tadokoro, C.E., Lepelley, A., Lafaille, J.J., Cua, D.J., and Littman, D.R. (2006). The orphan nuclear receptor RORgammat directs the differentiation program of proinflammatory IL-17+ T helper cells. Cell 126, 1121-1133.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3tql9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k469","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7tuhe","text":"Cut out the entire small intestine – from stomach to caecum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eij8t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9op4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"f3lt6","text":"Note: This protocol is adapted from Ivanov et al, 2006. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3qvtg","text":"As you are cutting it out, remove residual fat and connective tissue.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tepr","text":"Place in ice cold PBS, move on to the next mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bt9s4","text":"Continue removing all fat and connective tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38phn","text":"Cut out the Peyer’s patches.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqu8t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vtdd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a14e5","text":"There should be 9-12 PPs in total.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c6dm0","text":"Cut open the intestine longitudinally.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35tjm","text":"Place on a wet paper towel, use rounded forceps to scrape along the mucosa, removing mucous, bacteria, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cbcnt","text":"Place in a 50 mL conical tube with PBS, invert tube a few times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9oit1","text":"Pour of the supernatant, refill with fresh PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bf99r","text":"Repeat the PBS washes 5-6 more times until there is no visible debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d6q68","text":"Cut the intestine in large fragments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epevn","text":"Place the fragments in a 15 mL conical tube with   cell dissociation solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5-10","error":false,"guid":"B3DF2730209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bhpg","text":"To make   of cell dissociation solution (adjust as necessary):  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ccefd","text":"      HBSS  114.5 mL    0.5 M EDTA  1.2 mL    1M HEPES  1.2 mL    FBS  3.12 mL  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":80}],"data":{}},{"key":"5f5aa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"120","error":false,"guid":"BA4F1A30209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["110","89"],"data":[["HBSS","114.5 mL"],["0.5 M EDTA","1.2 mL"],["1 M HEPES","1.2 mL"],["FBS","3.12 mL"]],"guid":"A1E4C690209A11EE89310A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["HBSS","114.5 mL"],["0.5 M EDTA","1.2 mL"],["1 M HEPES","1.2 mL"],["FBS","3.12 mL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cejc3","text":"Incubate for   on the rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4kdgj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C8A4FE60209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"100","start":null,"temperature":"37","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"222lp","text":"Vortex well for  , take out the supernatant with a metal strainer, keep the pieces, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3p7cq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":25,"guid":"D94C4CA0209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3tqbc","text":"Repeat steps 10-12.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67o6o","text":"Collect the fragments, rinse in HBSS in a small petri dish, cut using a razor blade (~1 mm2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":90,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g4b6","text":"Digest for   at   with slow rotation in   digestion mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ijli","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"E6BCD9E0209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E8954360209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"EB788D30209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86uvj","text":"To make   of digestion mix (adjust as necessary): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"912j0","text":"      RPMI  126.6 mL    FBS  9 mL    DNase I  720 ul    Dispase (5U/mL)  18 mL    Collagenase D (Roche)  360 ul  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":113}],"data":{}},{"key":"c3iq4","text":"From   stock solution, to make working conc of  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"180","error":false,"guid":"F0E5DD40209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["172","92"],"data":[["RPMI","126.6 mL"],["FBS","9 mL"],["DNase I","720 ul"],["Dispase (5U/mL)","18 mL"],["Collagenase D (Roche)","360 ul"]],"guid":"FC9583DE209A11EE89310A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ejir","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["RPMI","126.6 mL"],["FBS","9 mL"],["DNase I","720 ul"],["Dispase (5U/mL)","18 mL"],["Collagenase D (Roche)","360 ul"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"F3FD7D80209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"F92ADE60209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c56a","text":"Vortex well for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"FFF79760209B11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5i79","text":"Collect the supernatant by filtering through   strainer in 50 mL falcon tube at   to avoid cold temperature shock. Keep it   afterwards.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"0B5E4AE0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"100"}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"12781270209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A61CB3F0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ftso","text":"Put remaining tissue fragment back into the same tube with   of new digestion mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"1A504800209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9tvej","text":"Repeat steps 16-18 two more times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eelda","text":"Combine all appropriate supernatants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er352","text":"Centrifuge at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"98aq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"21DCF5A0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77oq9","text":"Prepare Percoll (adjust amounts as necessary).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ink3","text":"    a. 100% Percoll =   stock Percoll +   10X PBS (  total).\n    b. 80% Percoll =   100% Percoll +   10% RPMI-FBS (  total).\n    c. 40% Percoll =   100% Percoll +   10% RPMI-FBS (  total).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":99,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":115,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":146,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":163,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":179,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"45","error":false,"guid":"291E6970209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"2B3A1D80209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"2D8C23D0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"24","error":false,"guid":"2F7FDD80209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"3157AAC0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"336E2EB0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"367924C0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"383D9110209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"8":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"3A93B610209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5hh8","text":"Add   of 80% Percoll to the bottom of a 15 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"43B53480209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nks8","text":"Resuspend with LPL cells in   of 40% Percoll to get homogenous solution, then add the remaining  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"4982A5F0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"4C718880209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dovg","text":"Gently add   of the 40% Percoll cell solution on top of the 80% Percoll in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"501674A0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6btto","text":"Centrifuge at  , without brake (accel 1, decel 0).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"944uj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"2500","duration":1200,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"574B3E40209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"65nto","text":"Collect and discard the top layer of epithelium and debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"320cm","text":"Collect white cell layer at the interface between the 40% and 80% Percoll.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7nqgp","text":"Dilute with 10% RPMI-FBS, invert a few times to mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"183cc","text":"Pellet by centrifugation for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d58u0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"2000","duration":420,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"62DBC0E0209C11EE81193F5015F0D925","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c7sio","text":"Aspirate SN and resuspend cells FACS buffer, then start FACS stain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
